title: AVG PC TUNEUP 2014 SMALL UPDATE 1 &ndash; Beta version
description:
AVG PC TUNEUP 2014 VERSION DESCRIPTION
======================================
Product: AVG PC TuneUp
Version: 2014 (build 244) Small Update 1

IMPROVEMENTS
============
* Improved cleaning definitions:
	- new definitions for cleaning Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 Metro applications
	- new definitions for cleaning Malwarebytes Anti-Malware 1.75, Adobe Photoshop CS6, Adobe Lightroom, Nero 12, Avast Pro Antivirus
	- updated definitions for Shortcut Cleaner
* Duplicate Finder:
	- Browse dialog is enhanced with checkboxes per each location
	- added Stop button and possibility to show current results when scan is in progress
	- Show duplicates dialog has been removed
	- duplicate folders are now shown in the results
	- picture previews are now resizable
	- added Excluded files option into settings
	- Duplicate Finder window is now resizable
* User Interface:
	- Maintenance tile now shows yellow status when first scan after installation is skipped or maintenance has not been performed in the last 14 days
                                             
FIXES
=====
* Program Deactivator: Fixed issue with disabled Acrobat reader
* Duplicate Finder: Fixed issue with ignore hidden files
* Installation: Fixed issue with slow transition between 1st and 2nd installation screen
* Fixed crashes of Main UI, Performance Optimizer, Startup Manager
